letters.description: Perform a comprehensive assessment of gastrointestinal symptoms, medical history, and current dietary patterns to establish a clinical baseline.
Pinpoint specific food sensitivities, environmental triggers, and lifestyle stressors that contribute to intestinal permeability and dysbiosis.
Systematically remove inflammatory foods, pathogens, and toxins to reduce the toxic load and soothe the digestive tract.
Implement targeted nutritional protocols and supplements to repair the mucosal lining and optimize digestive enzyme production.
Reintroduce diverse whole foods and high-quality probiotics to foster a balanced, resilient, and thriving microbiome.
Establish sustainable lifestyle habits and long-term maintenance strategies to support the gut-brain axis and overall systemic health.
